name: Idle Inc
description:
Become a business tycoon in this immersive idle game. Start businesses, grow your real estate portfolio and best of all, see all of your work in augmented reality.

Idle Inc is meant to give the player all the control. You decide what your business empire should look like.
Go all the way from tiny shops, small mechanic stores to HUGE skyscrapers, and even stadiums.

Watch your empire grow from a tiny town with one tiny shop, to a full blown city. Blow up your living room in AR mode with a city larger than a real life bus and have your breath taking away while walking inside the city you created.


Get out your inner businessman and real estate mogul.
